modName: Solveig Winterhawk - Daughter of the Nords
summary:
Many of the follower mods are too heavy on anime. Therefore, I tried to create a Lore friendly figure for my game.
This is my first attempt that I would like to share with the community. Technical she is an stand-alone follower with an UNP compatible body.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=6][b][u][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4560/38129364176_8c9e569f2d_o.jpg[/img]

description
[/u][/b][/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]The Winterhawks.A clan of rough Nords who rarely spend their lives on land and travel the skerries from Skyrim to Cyrodiil. Always in search of valuable cargo in the port cities of the provinces or on the hunt for just as valuable cargo in foreign ship's bellies.
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]The "Tern", the birthplace of Solveig, was one of the Winterhawks most magnificent and famous boats - until the night when pirates boarded the "Tern" and during the fight the young Solveig was seriously injured by an arrow.Burning and tilted, the "Tern" was able to escape to the harbor of Dawnstar. Jarl Skald picked up injured Solveig to help her recover.During her recovery, she heard the emerging stories of a new Dragonborn and has been waiting for the opportunity to accompany this living legend.


[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4530/38184913501_4663f9d5f3_m.jpg[/img][/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]     [img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4479/38128868286_b7017b42b4_m.jpg[/img]     [img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4572/38128869426_19aa868525_m.jpg[/img]     [img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4533/38128867496_cdc3d843ed_m.jpg[/img]
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=6][b][u]
Details
[/u][/b][/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]Race: Nord.
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]Location: Dawnstar, the White Hall.
C[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]lass: assassine.
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]Essential: yes.
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3]Marriable: yes.



[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=3][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4502/38104692986_006cdd853e_b.jpg[/img]
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][color=#e69138][size=3][i]Solveig Winterhawk
[/i][/size][/color][/font][/center][color=#e69138][size=3][i]

[/i][/size][/color][center][font=Verdana][size=6][b][u]install
[/u][/b][/size][size=3]Using a mod manager of your choice or manually extract the contents to your Data folder.


[/size][size=3][b][u][size=6]uninstall
[/size][/u][/b][/size][size=3]Use your mod manager to uninstall or delete the files manually from the data directory.
